displayProperties.description: Use Cabal Gold to socket a Challenger Medallion into the Hammer of Proving. Once done, you will be ready to issue a challenge. The Hammer of Proving can be found in the Quest tab of the Director.

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Season 15

setData.questStepSummary: Caiatl's emissaries flood Sol with ceremonial Gold, a custom during the Era of Conquest. Conquered worlds are enriched to ease defeat and afford the opportunity to challenge officers for representation within the Cabal's leadership.

displayProperties.description:
Wield the Hammer of Proving to pillage Cabal Gold by completing playlist strikes, Gambit, Crucible, public events, dungeons, Nightmare Hunts, or the Blind Well.

The Hammer of Proving permits challenges of honorable combat to be issued, skirting the risk of total war with the Cabal. However, to be recognized as legitimate, it must be socketed with Cabal Gold.
displayProperties.name: Precious Plunder

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Season 15

setData.questStepSummary: Caiatl's emissaries flood Sol with ceremonial Gold, a custom during the Era of Conquest. Conquered worlds are enriched to ease defeat and afford the opportunity to challenge officers for representation within the Cabal's leadership.

displayProperties.description: Speak with Zavala in the Tower Courtyard.
displayProperties.name: Chosen of the Vanguard

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Season 15

setData.questStepSummary: Guardians across the system have halted Caiatl's attempts at filling out her War Council, but tensions are ready to snap. To avoid all-out war, Zavala has approved Osiris's plan to issue a challenge to Caiatl that would bring a swift end to this conflict. Lord Saladin does not believe Caiatl can be trusted, after everything she has done, and is ready for the war that he sees on the horizon. The fate of the City rests on the edge of a knife. Find the balance and see this through.

displayProperties.description: With your Challenger Medallion socketed, the Hammer of Proving is ready. Challenge a prospective Commander and pillage Caiatl's Tribute Chest at the end of a Battleground to disrupt their Rite of Proving. The Battlegrounds playlist may be found in the Director under Vanguard missions.
displayProperties.name: Ransack the Hoard

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Season 15

setData.questStepSummary: Caiatl's emissaries flood Sol with ceremonial Gold, a custom during the Era of Conquest. Conquered worlds are enriched to ease defeat and afford the opportunity to challenge officers for representation within the Cabal's leadership.

displayProperties.description: Speak with Crow at the War Table.
displayProperties.name: Parting Ways, For Now

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Season 15

setData.questStepSummary:
Crow's revelation is still being kept under wraps. While Vanguard High Command is aware of his identity, they would prefer to take a slow approach to spreading that information.

His gallantry has earned him a space in the City, however, and an official institution as a Guardian. With his first mission in hand from Zavala, the future is looking bright.

displayProperties.description: Complete the Proving Grounds strike aboard the Halphas Electus.
displayProperties.name: Chariot of Fire

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Season 15

setData.questStepSummary: Vanguard High Command has issued a challenge to the new Cabal Empire. A Vanguard victory will drive the Cabal from the Sol system, whereas a defeat would see the City brought under Cabal control. It falls to you. Defeat Caiatl's Champion aboard the Imperial Land Tank, Halphas Electus, and show them that Guardians do not bow to outside aggressors.

displayProperties.description: Visit Zavala in the Tower.
displayProperties.name: Debriefing

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Season 15

setData.questStepSummary: Your victory rings through the halls of the City, and the shadow of a unified Cabal Empire is fading from Sol's light. While the armistice with Caiatl is an uneasy one, it will hold for the time being.

1256572565.displaySource: "My lair is a sanctum, Guardian. A space where I alone hold dominion. I don't like the idea of someone or something deciding it wants to eavesdrop, or worse…" —Spider

1290127862.displaySource: "I'm… somewhere. I know that's not helpful. It's a ruin, on Earth, I think. I'm flying, and there's these… towers and… ships? I land on a broken, concrete pillar, and I see… myself? But it's not me. I don't think it ever was. I'm saying words I've never said, and… the Guardian is there. Yes, that one." — ???

My heart hurt—ached—and I felt so much guilt and… and shame. Regret. No, I don't remember anything else." — ???

setData.questStepSummary:
You've dealt a serious blow, but Empress Caiatl is not the type to give up so easily. Though she has yet to officially declare war, she has issued a call to all Cabal commanders to prove themselves worthy of a seat on her War Council. It seems the tank on Nessus was one Commander Dracus's answer to that invitation.

This escalation of tensions cannot be ignored. Zavala has designated a new space in the Tower—the Hub for Emergency Logistics and Maneuvers—for handling this crisis. Report there for further instructions.

displayProperties.description: Bring the Bell of Conquests you found to the War Table in the H.E.L.M. to receive further instructions.
displayProperties.name: The War Table

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Season 15

setData.questStepSummary: Rising tensions with Caiatl and her followers have stretched the Vanguard thinner than ever. For ease of communication, the War Table will serve as a hub for important messages and weekly updates regarding the conflict with the Cabal.

The campaign for Season of the Lost.
setData.questStepSummary: Petra Venj barred Crow from an audience with The Witch Queen. Glint tells your Ghost that Crow wonders why you are trusted with Savathûn and he is not. Petra seems reluctant to explain Mara Sov's decision to Crow. It's only a matter of time before tensions snap. Someone should speak to Crow before he does anything rash.

displayProperties.description: Savathûn wishes to converse with her friend, the Guardian. You.
displayProperties.name: Interrogation

tooltipNotifications.displayString: This quest step will progress at the next weekly reset
Expires at the end of Season 15

setData.questLineDescription:
Rescue Mara Sov's scattered Techeuns to fulfill her uneasy bargain with Savathûn.

The campaign for Season of the Lost.
setData.questStepSummary: The Witch Queen, Savathûn, awaits you. She is somehow aware that Mara Sov has granted you access to her crystal prison. See what information the Witch Queen lets slip. But take care; Savathûn weaves lies and deceit with ease.

displayProperties.description: Petra Venj waits at the portal to Mara Sov's Chambers. She has a complaint about Crow's curiosity.
displayProperties.name: Unauthorized Access

tooltipNotifications.displayString: This quest step will progress at the next weekly reset
Expires at the end of Season 15

setData.questLineDescription:
Rescue Mara Sov's scattered Techeuns to fulfill her uneasy bargain with Savathûn.

The campaign for Season of the Lost.
setData.questStepSummary: Crow has been trying to speak with Savathûn alone. He believes he is owed an explanation and grows tired of people putting road blocks in front of him. Petra Venj thinks Savathûn will manipulate Crow. Someone needs to mitigate the situation.

displayProperties.description:
Bring the Wayfinder's Compass back to the Awoken wing of the H.E.L.M. Each rescued Techeun can assist in unlocking new abilities from the Compass.

A Wayfinder's Compass upgrade is now available.
displayProperties.name: Return to the H.E.L.M.

tooltipNotifications.displayString: This quest step will progress at the next weekly reset
Expires at the end of Season 15

setData.questLineDescription:
Rescue Mara Sov's scattered Techeuns to fulfill her uneasy bargain with Savathûn.

The campaign for Season of the Lost.
setData.questStepSummary: The Ley Lines that form the Shattered Realm are full of mysteries and lost treasures. Upgrade the Wayfinder's Compass to explore the Ascendant Plane further.

displayProperties.description: Each Techeun found, each clearing of the Ley Lines brings Mara Sov's plan closer to fruition. Continue collecting Parallax Trajectory, conducting Astral Alignments, and charting the Ley Lines of the Shattered Realm. Eventually, Savathûn's worm will be exorcised and the real Osiris will be returned.
displayProperties.name: Shifting of the Ley Lines

tooltipNotifications.displayString: This quest step will progress at the next weekly reset

setData.questLineDescription:

setData.questStepSummary: The Ley Lines are degrading, polluted with Taken corruption and Hive spellcraft. This causes them to mirror aspects of the material world. Primal cosmic forces govern the Ley Lines. Conditions must be perfect to open a pathway for the next rescue mission.

displayProperties.description: Petra would like to discuss Crow's behavior with you.
displayProperties.name: Petra's Grievances

tooltipNotifications.displayString: This quest step will progress at the next weekly reset

setData.questLineDescription:
Rescue Mara Sov's scattered Techeuns to fulfill her uneasy bargain with Savathûn.

The campaign for Season of the Lost.
setData.questStepSummary: Through your efforts of aligning the Blind Well and tracking down Ascendant Anchors and Parallax Trajectory, a lost Techeun has been located. Their position isn't exact, but it has been localized to a Ley Line within the Shattered Realm. The Ascendant Plane awaits.

displayProperties.description:
Collect Parallax Trajectory to triangulate the location of lost Techeuns.

Collecting Ascendant Anchors in the open world grants large quantities of Parallax Trajectory each week.

Parallax Trajectory can also be earned by completing strikes, Crucible and Gambit matches, public events, and more.
displayProperties.name: Ship Without and Anchor

tooltipNotifications.displayString: This quest step will progress at the next weekly reset
Expires at the end of Season 15

setData.questLineDescription:
Rescue Mara Sov's scattered Techeuns to fulfill her uneasy bargain with Savathûn.

The campaign for Season of the Lost.
setData.questStepSummary: Techeuns leave Ascendant Anchors as stitches between the Ascendant Plane and this one to find their way home if a Ley Line were to collapse. With the Blind Well aligned, these anchors will light the way to the lost Techeuns.

displayProperties.description: Each Techeun found, each clearing of the Ley Lines brings Mara Sov's plan closer to fruition. Continue collecting Parallax Trajectory, conducting Astral Alignments, and charting the Ley Lines of the Shattered Realm. Eventually, Savathûn's worm will be exorcised and the real Osiris will be returned.
displayProperties.name: Shifting of the Ley Lines

tooltipNotifications.displayString: This quest step will progress at the next weekly reset
Expires at the end of Season 15

setData.questLineDescription:
Rescue Mara Sov's scattered Techeuns to fulfill her uneasy bargain with Savathûn.

The campaign for Season of the Lost.
setData.questStepSummary: The Ley Lines are degrading, polluted with Taken corruption and Hive spellcraft. This causes them to mirror aspects of the material world. Primal cosmic forces govern the Ley Lines. Conditions must be perfect to open a pathway for the next rescue mission.

3926234958.displaySource: "Losing a Ghost is a traumatic experience for a Guardian. Total severance from the Light, from the Traveler, from their destiny as a Guardian. I can't even imagine how that feels." —Ghost
